channel.title: Problems with server on vista!
channel.description: ok, so.. i just got Windows Vista and when i run my server that i had on XP, it will look like it's running fine and i opened a port on my router and i got the no-ip DUC and everthing but NO ONE CAN LOG IN.. it's weird..if anyone can help me that would be GREAT

item.title: Problems with server on vista!
item.dc:creator: @zeldaownsyou zeldaownsyou
item.description:
@zeldaownsyou wrote:

like if i ran the Auto updates?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2008, 04:25:25 PM[/size][hr]ooooooh i get it
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2008, 04:28:00 PM[/size][hr]no, i’m on the same comp but it is not working still no idea…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2008, 04:33:31 PM[/size][hr]W00000000000000T!
i GOT IT WORKING!
thanks dude…
i had to remake the name on No-ip.com dude it was connecting to wrong ip that’s why! w0000t!
